trans-unit.source: Provides a specialized <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that is optimized for loading images using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 제공 된 특수 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> 사용 하 여 이미지를 로드 하기 위한 최적화 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage primarily exists to support [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax and introduces additional properties for bitmap loading that are not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage 주로 지원할 수 있는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 구문 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> 에 로드 하는 비트맵 정의 되지 않은 대 한 추가 속성을 소개 하 고

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage 구현 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>여러 속성에 대 한 초기화를 최적화 하는 인터페이스입니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 속성 변경만 개체를 초기화 하는 동안 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>신호를 보내 해당 초기화가 시작 하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>해당 초기화가 완료 신호를 보내.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 초기화 된 후 속성 변경은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A> constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage 개체를 사용 하 여 만든는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A>생성자는 자동으로 초기화 하 고 속성 변경 내용을 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>구현 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>여러 속성에 대 한 초기화를 최적화 하는 인터페이스입니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 초기화 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>이 생성자를 사용 하 여 만든, 간에 속성 초기화를 수행 해야 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>호출.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class by using the supplied <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> 에 제공 된 <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri> 를 사용 하 여 클래스

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>이 생성자를 사용 하 여 만들어진 개체가 자동으로 초기화 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 초기화 된 후 속성 변경은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> to use as the source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
The uriSource parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The uriSource parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The file specified by the uriSource parameter is not found.
trans-unit.target: 로 지정 된 파일의 uriSource 매개 변수를 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class with an image whose source is a <xref:System.Uri>, and is cached according to the provided <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> 원본 이미지를 사용 하 여 클래스는 <xref:System.Uri>, 캐시 되 고에 제공 된 따라 <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>이 생성자를 사용 하 여 만들어진 개체가 자동으로 초기화 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 초기화 된 후 속성 변경은 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The <xref:System.Uri> to use as the source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref> that specifies the caching requirements for images that are obtained using HTTP.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"> </xref> HTTP를 사용 하 여 가져오는 이미지에 대 한 캐싱 요구 사항을 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The uriSource parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The uriSource parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The file specified by the uriSource parameter is not found.
trans-unit.target: 로 지정 된 파일의 uriSource 매개 변수를 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the base <xref:System.Uri> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> context.
trans-unit.target: 밑을 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref:System.Uri>현재 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> 컨텍스트.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Uri> of the current context.
Signals the start of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> initialization.
Property initialization must be done between BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: BeginInit 사이 속성 초기화를 수행 해야 하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>호출.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 한 번의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>되었습니다 초기화 속성 변경은 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> is currently being initialized.
BeginInit has already been called.
-or- The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> has already been initialized.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref> to use for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
Set the CacheOption to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> if you wish to close a stream used to create the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> 를 만드는 데는 스트림의 닫을 하려는 경우</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> 에 CacheOption 설정

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the image is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>캐시 옵션은 이미지가 필요 하 고 정리는 가비지 수집기에서 처리 될 때까지 스트림이에 대 한 액세스를 보유 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref> being used for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>,이 개체 값의 전체 복사본입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을 복사 하는 경우이 메서드 (이러한 요소는 더 이상 확인) 리소스 참조와 데이터 바인딩을 하지만 하지 애니메이션 또는 해당 현재 값을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 복제 된 개체의 <> </> *> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에 원본의 <> </> *> 속성은<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref> 개체를이 개체의 현재 값의 전체 복사본입니다.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 리소스 참조, 데이터 바인딩 및 애니메이션은 복사 되지 않지만 이러한 요소의 현재 값은입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 복제 된 개체의 <> </> *> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에 원본의 <> </> *> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

To be added.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> used for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CreateOptions*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: 이미지가 디코드 되는 픽셀 단위로 높이 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>무시 되는 비트맵의 가로 세로 비율 설정 이기도 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>가로 세로 비율 동일 하 게 유지를 설정 하지 않으면.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] 및 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 코덱 고유 하 게 지정된 된 크기에 이미지를 디코딩할; 다른 코덱은 원래 크기에 이미지 및 이미지를 원하는 크기의 크기를 조정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
The default value is 0.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the width, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: 이미지가 디코드 되는 픽셀에서 너비를 설정 하거나 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> 무시 되는 비트맵의 가로 세로 비율 설정 이기도 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>가로 세로 비율 동일 하 게 유지를 설정 하지 않으면.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] 및 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 코덱 고유 하 게 지정된 된 크기에 이미지를 디코딩할; 다른 코덱은 원래 크기에 이미지 및 이미지를 원하는 크기의 크기를 조정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> does not support the Metadata property and will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>메타 데이터 속성을 지원 하지 않으며 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> 을 throw 합니다

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
An attempt to read the Metadata occurs.
trans-unit.target: 메타 데이터를 읽으려는 시도가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> is rotated to.
Rotation is performed after scaling.
trans-unit.target: 회전 배율 조정 후 수행 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This means that an image that has a Rotation of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> of 10, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> of 5 will result in an image that has a width of 5 and a height of 10.
trans-unit.target: 즉, 회전 된 이미지 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>10 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>5의 너비가 5와 10의 높이가 그에 따라 이미지가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The rotation that is used for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.Rotation*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the rectangle that is used as the source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 원본으로 사용 되는 사각형을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that is used as the source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
The default is <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty*>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.SourceRect*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the stream source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
If StreamSource and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A> are both set, the StreamSource value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우 StreamSource 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>모두 설정 값은 무시 됩니다 StreamSource.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> if you wish to close the stream after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> is created.
The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>비트맵의 필요 정도와 정리는 가비지 수집기에서 처리 될 때까지 캐시 옵션 스트림에 대 한 액세스를 보유 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The stream source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that represents the caching policy for images that come from an HTTP source.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 소스에서 제공 하는 이미지에 대 한 캐싱 정책을 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: UriCachePolicy is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The base <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref> of the current context.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriCachePolicy*> dependency property.
UriCachePolicyProperty is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref:System.Uri> source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A> and UriSource are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A> value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A>UriSource 모두 설정 하 고, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A>값은 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource*> dependency property.
To be added.
